sentences.en: "Things are moving ahead."— I found that statement vague and unclear.
sentences.cn: “事情正在取得进展。”——我认为这个说法含糊不清。

sentences.en: An open verdict was the only appropriate one , given the very unclear evidence at the inquest.
sentences.cn: 调查发现的证据十分不清楚,只有作出存疑判决才恰当.

sentences.en: Experts remain unclear as to why the danger appears to have been steadily increasing.
sentences.cn: 专家依然不清楚为什么危险似乎一直在增大。

sentences.en: He is still unclear about his own future.
sentences.cn: 他仍然不清楚自己的将来会怎样。
目前仍不清楚他的行程安排。

sentences.en: How rigorously the test will be applied in future cases is unclear.
sentences.cn: 现在还不清楚在将来的案例中,对这种检验的运用能严厉到何种程度.

sentences.en: I am happy to clarify any points that are still unclear.
sentences.cn: 我愿意说明任何仍然不清楚的地方.

sentences.en: If you do not sleep you might become unclear in the head. "
sentences.cn: 如果你不睡觉,你会搞得脑筋糊涂起来. ”

sentences.en: It is unclear whether the meeting will go ahead as planned.
sentences.cn: 会议是否会如期举行还不清楚.

sentences.en: Just what the soldier was doing in Bireij is unclear.
sentences.cn: 就连那个士兵在比雷杰干什么都不清楚。

sentences.en: Moreover, the evidence of harm was unclear.
sentences.cn: 更有甚者, 危害的证据尚不清楚.

sentences.en: The monograph is conceptually confused, unclear in its structure and weak in its methodology.
sentences.cn: 这篇专论概念混淆，结构不清，研究方法也经不起推敲。

sentences.en: The terms of the contract are very unclear.
To this day, it's unclear whether he shot himself or was murdered.
sentences.cn: 至今尚不清楚他究竟是饮弹自杀还是被谋杀。

sentences.en: What precisely triggered off yesterday's riot is still unclear.
sentences.cn: 究竟是什么引发了昨天的骚乱还不清楚。

trans.tran_cn: 不清楚的，不明白的，含糊不清
trans.tran_en: difficult to understand or be sure about, so that there is doubt or confusion
